articles.title: There should be more discussion about Iga’s on court behavior, her blatant hindrances make it hard to warm to her success: Tennis fans criticize Iga Swiatek for controversial racquet change during US Open final - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Iga Swiatek downed Ons Jabeur in the final of the 2022 US Open to lift her maiden title at the tournament and her third Grand Slam title overall, but not before engulfing herself in controversy.
articles.content:
